content.query:
CREATE VIEW CustomerInfo AS
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asadatalake91628xh.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/customer-info/customerinfo.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


select * from CustomerInfo;
